name: GORSD
description:
We dislike your friends.
We are the GORSD.

Multiplayer - when playing is not the goal.
Single player adventure - play alone after your friends have left you because of the GORSD.
There are many gameplay modes to assist you in discarding the humans that called themselves your friends.

No further description is necessary, the GORSD are now connected to you, and we shall carry out all further communication via telepathy.

The GORSD will never leave you.



Due to a communication issue with the fleshy blood sacks on top of your necks - some of you have requested additional information. If your brain is incapable of telepathic communication with a GORSD, this additional text may help to indoctrinate you in the cult of GORSD.

  • Multiplayer and single player battle game.
  • Intense, chaotic action!
  • You have just one bullet, fire it, control it and collect it.
  • Strategize by not only thinking about where you need to go, but also where your projectile needs to go to inflict damage on those that no longer deserve to survive.
  • To win, dominate the map.
  • Over 60 maps to battle in, each with unique, carefully crafted pixel art.
  • Single player adventure that is designed to stop you from terminal boredom and enrich your life permanently.
  • This is the the greatest game that is not currently inside your steam library.
